ai.summary: A gentle 2.3 km circuit through My Lady's Wood at Oxburgh Estate in the UK. This easy hike is suitable for families and casual walkers, offering shaded woodland scenery and a relaxing countryside stroll around the estate grounds.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat to gently undulating woodland paths with packed earth and gravel. Some sections may be rooty or uneven, and trails can become muddy after rain. Expect shaded routes with small clearings and occasional viewpoints toward the estate vicinity.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths and respect estate access rules. Check opening hours and avoid visiting outside approved times. Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing, bring water, and carry a map or charged phone. Be mindful of muddy conditions, animals, and private property; dogs should be leashed where required. Weather can change quickly in the UK; plan accordingly.
recommended_gear: Hat and sunscreen for sun protection
Map or offline navigation on phone
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; winter visits can be muddy and daylight hours are shorter.

seo.title: My Lady's Wood, Oxburgh Estate – Easy 2.3 km UK Hike
seo.meta_description: Discover an easy 2.3 km woodland loop at My Lady's Wood, Oxburgh Estate in the UK. A shaded, family-friendly hike with gentle terrain around the estate grounds.
